DOC.brief_summary: - Randomized controlled trial comparing specialized AF Clinic with 'care as usual' - Hypothesis: treatment of AF patients in the AF-Clinic by a nurse, specialised in AF, using guideline-based dedicated software, under supervision of a cardiologist, is efficient, safe and not inferior to care as usual by a cardiologists.
DOC.brief_title: Atrial Fibrillation (AF) Clinic to Improve the Treatment of Patients With Atrial Fibrillation.
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed atrial fibrillation Age < 18 years unwillingness to participate
